hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Saeed Al-Khudri that the Prophet said:"Whoever fasts a day in the cause of Allah, Allah will separate his face from the heat of Hell (a distance of) seventy autumns

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى سُفْيَانَ الثَّوْرِيِّ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning the differences reported from Sufyan Ath-Thawri
